author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dolby Laboratories Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.66
text:
Dolby Laboratories Inc:
* DOLBY LABORATORIES REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.78
* Q2 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.66 * Q2 REVENUE $301.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $300.4 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.64 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q3 TOTAL REVENUE WILL RANGE FROM $310 MILLION TO $320 MILLION
* SEES Q3 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.64 TO $0.70 * SEES Q3 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.78 TO $0.84
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.165 BILLION TO $1.185 BILLION * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.81, REVENUE VIEW $330.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.97, REVENUE VIEW $1.18 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
